page.title: 02A NORMAL DAY
page.content: I WAKE UP AT 7.45 AM.GO INTO THE KITCHEN WHERE MY MOTHER WILL HAVE MY BREAKFAST READY.AFTER MY BREAKFAST I GO DOWN TO THE BATHROOM TO GET WASHED AND DRESSED . I HAVE TO WALK 2 Km. TO SCHOOL.FIRST THING IN THE MORNING WE GET SPELLING FROM 9.00 AM.-9.45 AM.AFTER WE DO MATHS FROM 9.45 AM UNTIL 10.40 AM BREAKTIME. AT 11.00 AM WE COME IN AND IT'S TIME FOR SEWING WITH MRS. CAMERON UNTIL 12.00 NOON.MY LUNCH TIME IS FROM 12.00-1.00PM. WHEN WE COME IN FROM DINNER AT 1.00PM WE GO TO GYM UNTIL 2.15 PM.WE HAVE A 10 MINUTE BREAK AT 2.25. FROM 2.45-3.45,WE GET ACTIVITIES WHICH INCLUDE BAKING, GAMES,LOCAL STUDIES,KNITTING,BRITISH SEA BIRDS,SEASHORE AND PAINTING TO MUSIC. SCHOOL FINISHES AT 3.45 PM.
